name: Oebfinn, Father of the Abyss
text:
You can’t cast this spell during your first 12 turns of the game.

When Óebfinn, Sons of The Abyss' Father enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand and it's the first creature that you've casted this game, win the game. 
Summon ({X}, Discard this card: Add X mana of {g}, {u} or {b}.)
